Summary: was watching jet planes enjoying weather.white saucer appeared .turned left got superwhite bright .shrinks to orange ball 2blinks gone .it kept ciming back.23 min.observed..
divs: Sighting Detailsi was working at sunoco..weather was nice it was a perfect day no clouds at all not any clouds ...i was standing out side watching passenger planes flying west in sky out of bwi airport..there were 7 or 8 in the air..4 planes had contrails they were shaded orange from sun..when out of no where a dim white flying saucer turns left slowly get realy big..it was at least 10 or 15 times larger than any planes in the sky and there were at least 4 or 5 the whole 23 minutes that this went on..you could see the planes all on outsides of ufo.0..whenit appears it is dim it get big turns left gets super bright white starts turning blue orange red green shrinking in size when it got to be a small orange ball it blinked 2 times and was gone every 90 seconds it came back and did evrything i described all over again...this went on for 23 minutes there were 3 customers whom also seen this one got out of his car tried to use his binoculars.. this started at 6..06pm and ended at6..29 pm....
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Ellicott City
There were no other sightings in Ellicott City on or around October 26th 2013
